Package parallel.distributed

Extends the basic functionality found in the parallel package over many remote JVMs distributed over a network of machines.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DMsgIntf
    DMsgIntf objects are meant to transport over Socket wires sendData() and/or recvData() requests, as those are defined in the parallel.MsgPassingCoordinator class, which is in fact the class used to "transfer" message data between the threads in the parallel.distributed.DMsgPassingCoordinatorSrv class.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BCastSrv
    A broadcast object server, that broadcasts to all clients connected to it, any double value received by any of the connected clients.
    BCastSrv2DAccumulatorBridge
    small bridge program that connects to a BCastSrv server as another client, as well as to a DAccumulatorSrv for getting its notifications, and submitting them to the broadcast server.
    DAccessHashtable
    Implements a shared-memory-type hash-table that allows for distributed JVM process clients to access a hash-table for get/put functionality.
    DAccMsg
    DAccMsg objects are meant to transport over Socket wires number accumulation requests (accumulate-data or get[Min/Max/Sum...] requests).
    DAccNotTypeMAX
    class defines DAccumulatorNotificationType=MAX.
    DAccNotTypeMIN
    class defines DAccumulatorNotificationType=MIN.
    DAccNumberRequest
    encapsulates a request to accumulate a number in the server.
    DAccNumbersRequest
    encapsulates a request to accumulate an array of numbers in the server.
    DAccSerDblPairRequest
    encapsulates a request to accumulate a (Serializable,double) pair in the server.
    DAccumulatorClt
    class implementing clients for sending accumulating numbers between threads living in distributed JVMs (or for asking the current min/max/sum value among the received numbers).
    DAccumulatorClt.AsynchUpdateThread
    auxiliary thread class is responsible for opening a connection to the DAccumulatorSrv's notification-port, and listening for incoming numbers representing new (min or max) incumbents.
    DAccumulatorNotificationType
    Helper class that DAccumulatorClt clients use to subscribe their interest to a DAccumulatorSrv object about receiving updates when new max or min values are sent to the server.
    DAccumulatorSrv
    class implements a server for distributed data accumulation functionality.
    DActiveMsgPassingCoordinatorLongLivedConnClt
    class implementing clients for message-passing between threads living in distributed JVMs.
    DActiveMsgPassingCoordinatorLongLivedConnSrv
    server class implementing distributed Message-Passing between inter-process (and intra-process) threads.
    DActiveMsgPassingLongLivedConnTest
    test for the DActiveMsgPassingCoordinatorLongLivedConn[Clt/Srv] classes.
    DActiveMsgPassingLongLivedConnTest.DActiveMsgPassingLLCTestSerObject2
    auxiliary trivial inner class, not part of the public API.
    DActiveMsgPassingLongLivedConnTest.DMPThread2
    auxiliary inner class, not part of the public API.
    DBarrier
    class implements a distributed barrier object across many threads living in many (remote) JVMs.
    DBarrierAddRequest
    implements a DMsgIntf object that asks a DBarrierSrv to add the corresponding thread to its pool of participants in the DBarrier.
    DBarrierRequest
    implements a request to enter the barrier state.
    DBarrierRmRequest
    class implementing a DBarrier Remove Request for the associated thread that called the relevant DBarrier.removeCurrentThread() method.
    DBarrierSrv
    class implements a server for distributed barrier functionality.
    DBarrierTest
    test-driver for the DBarrier class.
    DBTThread
    auxiliary class for the DBarrierTest main driver program, not part of the public API.
    DConditionCounter
    wrapper singleton class for ConditionCounter objects.
    DConditionCounterAwaitRequest
    implements a DMsgIntf object that asks a DConditionCounterSrv to await its associated ConditionCounter until it reaches zero.
    DConditionCounterClt
    class implements a distributed parallel.ConditionCounter across many threads living in many (remote) JVMs.
    DConditionCounterDecrRequest
    implements a DMsgIntf object that asks a DConditionCounterSrv to decrement its associated ConditionCounter.
    DConditionCounterIncrRequest
    implements a DMsgIntf object that asks a DConditionCounterSrv to increment its associated ConditionCounter.
    DConditionCounterLLCClt
    Same functionality as DConditionCounter[Clt|Srv] classes, but use long-lived connections, for clients that call frequently incr/decr ops.
    DConditionCounterLLCSrv
    Same functionality as DConditionCounter[Clt|Srv] classes, but use long-lived connections, for clients that call frequently incr/decr ops.
    DConditionCounterResetRequest
    implements a DMsgIntf object that asks a DConditionCounterSrv to reset its associated ConditionCounter.
    DConditionCounterShutDownRequest
    implements a DMsgIntf object that asks a DConditionCounterSrv to shut-down.
    DConditionCounterSrv
    class implements a server for distributed condition-counter functionality.
    DFileAccessSrvStatsRequest
    class encapsulates request to return statistics about the server cache for a specific file being read.
    DFileDataVectorReadRequest
    class encapsulates request to read from a file residing on a machine running a msg-passing coordinator server, a certain range of vectors.
    DGetArgMaxObjectRequest
    encapsulates a request to get the argument corresponding to the max value sent in a (Serializable,double) pair accumulation request to a server.
    DGetArgMinObjectRequest
    encapsulates a request to get the argument corresponding to the min value sent in a (Serializable,double) pair accumulation request to a server.
    DGetMaxNumberRequest
    encapsulates a request to get the max value sent to a server.
    DGetMinNumberRequest
    encapsulates a request to get the min of values sent to a server.
    DGetSumOfNumbersRequest
    encapsulates a request to get the sum of all values sent to a server.
    DLock
    implements a distributed lock, valid across JVMs and across multiple threads in each JVM.
    DLockSrv
    class implements a server for distributed locking functionality.
    DLockTest
    tests the DLock class methods.
    DLockTest.DLockThread
    auxiliary inner class for the DLockTest class.
    DMsgPassingCoordinatorClt
    class implementing clients for message-passing between threads living in distributed JVMs.
    DMsgPassingCoordinatorSrv
    server class implementing distributed Message-Passing between inter-process (and intra-process) threads.
    DMsgPassingTest
    test for the DMsgPassingCoordinator[Clt/Srv] classes.
    DMsgPassingTest.DMPThread
    auxiliary inner-class, not part of the public API.
    DMsgPassingTest.DMsgPassingTestSerObject
    trivial auxiliary inner-class.
    DObjCacheAddReq
    helper class, not part of the public API.
    DObjCacheClearReq
    helper class, not part of the public API.
    DObjCacheGetAllReq
    helper class, not part of the public API.
    DObjectsCacheClt
    class provides client functionality to DObjectsCacheSrv server.
    DObjectsCacheSrv
    Server class that allows storage and retrieval of sets of objects into an in-memory cache.
    DRecvMsg
    implements a wrapper object for a "recvData()" request from a (local/remote) thread that is transmitted via the socket wire to the parallel.distributed.DMsgPassingCoordinatorSrv.
    DReduceAddRequest
    implements a DMsgIntf object that asks a DReduceSrv to add the corresponding thread to its pool of participants in the DReducer.
    DReducer
    class implements a distributed reducer object across many threads living in many (remote) JVMs.
    DReduceRequest
    implements a request to enter a distributed reduce operation.
    DReduceRmRequest
    class implementing a DReducer Remove Request for the associated thread that called the relevant DReducer.removeCurrentThread() method.
    DReduceSrv
    class implements a server for distributed reduce functionality.
    DRLockGetRequest
    implements a DMsgIntf object that asks a DRWLockSrv identified by name to get to the current thread a global read-lock.
    DRLockReleaseRequest
    implements a DMsgIntf object that asks a DRWLockSrv identified by name to release from the current thread a global read-lock.
    DRWLock
    class implements a distributed read-write lock object across many threads living in many (remote) JVMs.
    DRWLockSrv
    class implements a server for distributed read-write locking functionality.
    DSendMsg
    implements a wrapper object for a "sendData()" request from a (local/remote) thread that is transmitted via the socket wire to the parallel.distributed.DMsgPassingCoordinatorSrv.
    DShutDownSrvRequest
    encapsulates a request to shut-down a server.
    DWLockGetRequest
    implements a DMsgIntf object that asks a DRWLockSrv identified by name to get to the current thread a global write-lock.
    DWLockReleaseRequest
    implements a DMsgIntf object that asks a DRWLockSrv identified by name to release from the current thread a global write-lock.
    FailedExecutionResult
    empty auxiliary class represents response is an indication of a failed execution.
    FailedReply
    indicates to remote client a failure in a previous request.
    FwdSrv
    class implements a forwarding server.
    FwdSrv.LLCHdlrThread
    auxiliary inner-class starts a server-socket that listens for incoming client connections, and for each connection, starts an LLConnThread thread to handle it.
    FwdSrv.LLConnThread
    auxiliary inner-class is the thread that handles long-lived client connections.
    FwdSrv.SLConnRunnable
    auxiliary inner-class is the Runnable that handles short-lived client connections.
    FwdSrv.SocketIOS
    auxiliary inner-class representing a data-structure holding a socket and its associated i/o streams.
    GraphDiameterEvalTask
    auxiliary class implementing TaskObject interface, not part of the public API.
    LockIfAvailableRequest
    indicates a request for a distributed lock if one can be given immediately, with no waiting.
    LockNotAvailableNowResponse
    indicates a response that a distributed lock canNOT be given immediately, with no waiting.
    LockRequest
    indicates a request for a distributed lock.
    LockResponse
    indicates a succesful grant for a distributed lock.
    NoWorkerAvailableResponse
    auxiliary class used for wrapping an array of TaskObjects to send back to the server in the event a worker cannot handle them.
    OKReply
    indicates an "OK" response to a previous request.
    OKReplyData
    helper class not part of the public API.
    OKReplyRequestedPDBTExecWrkInitCmd
    empty (marker class).
    PDAsynchBatchTaskExecutorClt
    class implements the "Client" for networks of PDAsynchBatchTaskExecutorWrk workers attached to PDAsynchBatchTaskExecutorSrv servers (managers really), as a Singleton.
    PDAsynchBatchTaskExecutorCltTest
    test-driver for PDAsynchBatchTaskExecutorClt and networks of PDAsynchBatchTaskExecutorWrk objects in general.
    PDAsynchBatchTaskExecutorSrv
    Server class allows clients or workers to connect to this process and submit TaskObjects for asynchronous processing to any of the available workers in the network of connected workers.
    PDAsynchBatchTaskExecutorSrvAwaitWrksRequest
    auxiliary class wrapping a request so that PDAsynchBatchTaskExecutorClt client objects may await server's workers.
    PDAsynchBatchTaskExecutorSrvGetNumWrksRequest
    auxiliary class wrapping a request (from PDAsynchBatchTaskExecutorClt objects) asking the server for the number of connected workers.
    PDAsynchBatchTaskExecutorWrk
    class implements a worker process, that is capable of accepting (through network sockets) arrays of TaskObjects and executes them using a parallel.FasterParallelAsynchBatchTaskExecutor.
    PDAsynchBatchTaskExecutorWrkAvailabilityRequest
    auxiliary class wrapping a request (from PDAsynchBatchTaskExecutorSrv objects) asking for worker availability.
    PDAsynchBatchTaskExecutorWrkQueueSizeRequest
    auxiliary class wrapping a request (from PDAsynchBatchTaskExecutorSrv objects) asking for worker queue size.
    PDAsynchInitCmd
    empty abstract class extends RRObject.
    PDAsynchNoOpInitCmd
    no-op initialization command for PDAsynchBatchTaskExecutor[Clt|Srv|Wrk] objects.
    PDBatchTaskExecutor
    Class implements thread-pooling to allow its users to execute concurrently a batch of tasks implementing the TaskObject interface.
    PDBatchTaskExecutor.PDBTEThread
    auxiliary class for PDBatchTaskExecutor, implementing the threads in the executor's thread-pool.
    PDBatchTaskExecutorClt
    class implements the "Client" for networks of PDBatchTaskExecutorWrk workers.
    PDBatchTaskExecutorCltTest
    test-driver for PDBatchTaskExecutorClt and networks of PDBatchTaskExecutorWrk objects in general.
    PDBatchTaskExecutorCltTest2
    test-driver for PDBatchTaskExecutorClt and networks of PDBatchTaskExecutorWrk objects in general.
    PDBatchTaskExecutorSrv
    Server class allows clients or workers to connect to this process and submit TaskObjects for processing to any of the available workers in the network of connected workers.
    PDBatchTaskExecutorTest
    test-driver class for method executeTaskOnAllThreads(cmd) of class PDBatchTaskExecutor.
    PDBatchTaskExecutorTest2
    test-driver class for method throttleDown(num) of class PDBatchTaskExecutor.
    PDBatchTaskExecutorWrk
    class implements a worker process, that is capable of accepting (through network sockets) arrays of TaskObjects and executes them using a parallel.distributed.PDBatchTaskExecutor.
    PDBTETest
    test-driver of the PDBatchTaskExecutor class.
    PDBTETest.PDTestTask
    auxiliary inner-class, not part of the public API.
    PDBTExecCmd
    command for PDBTExecInited[Clt|Srv|Wrk] objects.
    PDBTExecInitedClt
    thread-safe class implements the "Client" for networks of PDBTExecInitedWrk workers.
    PDBTExecInitedCltTest
    test-driver for PDBTExecInitedClt and networks of PDBTExecInitedWrk objects in general.
    PDBTExecInitedCltTest2
    test-driver for PDBTExecInitedClt and networks of PDBTExecInitedWrk objects in general.
    PDBTExecInitedCltTestInitCommand
    auxiliary no-op class, not part of the public API.
    PDBTExecInitedCltTestInitCommand2
    auxiliary no-op class, not part of the public API.
    PDBTExecInitedSrv
    class extends the PDBatchTaskExecutorSrv class to allow a load-balancing distributed computing architecture, whereby a server object of this class can have many clients connected to it, but no other known servers connected to it at all.
    PDBTExecInitedWrk
    class implements a worker process, that is capable of accepting (through network sockets) arrays of TaskObjects and executes them using a parallel.distributed.PDBatchTaskExecutor.
    PDBTExecInitNoOpCmd
    no-op initialization command for PDBTExecInited[Clt|Srv|Wrk] objects.
    PDBTExecNoOpCmd
    no-op command for PDBTExecInited[Clt|Srv|Wrk] objects.
    PDBTExecOnAllThreadsCmd
    command for PDBTExecInited[Clt|Srv|Wrk] objects.
    PDBTExecSingleCltWrkInitSrv
    class extends the PDBatchTaskExecutorSrv class to allow a load-balancing distributed computing architecture, whereby a server object of this class can only have a single client connected to it, and no other known servers connected to it at all.
    RequestIgnoredReply
    indicates that the request to which this is the response, was ignored.
    RRObject
    auxiliary base-class wrapping up Requests/Results for TaskObjects processing.
    SimpleMessage
    encapsulates a single String object.
    TaskObjectsAsynchExecutionRequest
    auxiliary class wrapping a request for processing asynchronously TaskObjects, in networks of PDAsynchBatchTaskExecutor[Clt|Srv|Wrk] objects.
    TaskObjectsAsynchParallelExecutionRequest
    auxiliary class wrapping a request for processing asynchronously TaskObjects, in networks of PDAsynchBatchTaskExecutor[Clt|Srv|Wrk] objects, breaking them up in smaller chunks if needed.
    TaskObjectsExecutionRequest
    auxiliary class wrapping a request for processing TaskObjects in networks of PDBatchTaskExecutor[Clt|Srv|Wrk] objects.
    TaskObjectsExecutionResults
    auxiliary class wrapping the results of processing a TaskObject[].
    TaskObjectsParallelExecutionRequest
    auxiliary class wrapping a request for processing in parallel TaskObjects, used with PDBatchTaskExecutor[Srv|Wrk|Clt] networks of synchronous execution requests.
    TNLAsynchEvalTask
    auxiliary class implementing TaskObject interface, by means of evaluating the tests.TridNonlinearFunction at a given vector.
    TNLEvalTask
    auxiliary class implementing TaskObject interface, by means of evaluating the tests.TridNonlinearFunction at a given vector.
    UnlockRequest
    represents a request for releasing a distributed lock.
    UnlockResponse
    represents a successful response to releasing a distributed lock.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    PDAsynchBatchTaskExecutorException
    indicates an exception in the execution of a task collection in a remote PDAsynchBatchTaskExecutor[Wrk].
    PDAsynchBatchTaskExecutorNWAException
    indicates unavailability of capacity of all workers in a network of remote PDAsynchBatchTaskExecutor[Wrk] workers.
    PDBatchTaskExecutorException
    indicates an exception in the execution of a task collection in a remote PDBatchTaskExecutor[Wrk].

Package parallel.distributed Description

Extends the basic functionality found in the parallel package over many remote JVMs distributed over a network of machines.

Package Specification

The package contains algorithms for obtaining distributed locks, barriers, Parallel-Distributed (Synchronous or Asynchronous) Task Executors, and Message Passing Coordinators, over standard socket mechanisms (transport layer in the OSI stack), without using RMI or web-services technologies. For more details, read the documentation for each class. Each class comes with a test-driver program that show-cases its intended use and effects. The whole package makes heavy use of the parallel package and its classes. Notice that this package does not use secure socket layer communications; it assumes that the whole network of machines that will host the package's servers is in essentially a demilitarized zone (behind fire-walls, in appropriate domains etc.) Also notice that this package has several servers that can combine to scale far beyond O/S imposed limitations on the number of concurrent threads or sockets that a system may have open at any time, via the use of aggregators; for example, several DLockSrv servers may combine (by pointing to another, central DLockSrv) to allow for many more concurrent open lock requests than a single server can allow. Similarly, see the design for PD[Asynch]BatchTaskExecutor[Clt/Srv/Wrk] to see how networks or rings of servers can form, to each of which many more workers or clients may be connected than could in any single server.
